item.title: GmPT7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmPT7 Gene Name: phosphate transporter 7 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: A nodule-localized phosphate transporter GmPT7 plays an important role in enhancing symbiotic N2 fixation and yield in soybean.

item.title: SbPSTOL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Sb03g006765 Gene Symbol: SbPSTOL1 Gene Name: PHOSPHORUS-STARVATION TOLERANCE1 Genome: Species: Sorghum bicolor Functional Descriptions: SbPSTOL1 genes colocalized with quantitative trait loci for traits underlying root morphology and dry weight accumulation under low P via linkage mapping.

item.title: TaGS2-2Aa
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaGS2-2Aa Gene Name: glutamine synthetase 2 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Transgenic expression of TaGS2-2Ab significantly increased GS2 abundance and GS activity in leaves.

item.title: TaGS2-2Ab
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaGS2-2Ab Gene Name: glutamine synthetase 2 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Transgenic expression of TaGS2-2Ab significantly increased GS2 abundance and GS activity in leaves.

item.title: TaHDZipI-2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaHDZipI-2 Gene Name: Homeodomain leucine zipper class I-2 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: The homeodomain transcription factor TaHDZipI-2 from wheat regulates frost tolerance, flowering time and spike development in transgenic barley.

item.title: TaNAC2-5A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaNAC2-5A Gene Name: Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: The Nitrate-Inducible NAC Transcription Factor TaNAC2-5A Controls Nitrate Response and Increases Wheat Yield.

item.title: TaNF-YB4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaNF-YB4 Gene Name: Nuclear Factor Gamma4 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Constitutive overexpression of the TaNF-YB4 gene in transgenic wheat significantly improves grain yield.

item.title: TaPRR95
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TraesCS5B02G320500 Gene Symbol: TaPRR95 Gene Name: pseudo-response regulator 95 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Genome-editing of a circadian clock gene TaPRR95 facilitates wheat peduncle growth and heading date.
